reviews.review_text: The computer I received was defective. It seemed to be stuck on factory reset. I could load it but when the computer was turned off, everything disappeared. I’ve had other hp computers that have been very reliable. I gave it 4 stars because Walmart gave me a full refund with no hassles.

reviews.title: Don't order blue
reviews.review_text: I ordered a blue laptop and received pink. I tried again to order a blue one and this time got silver. The blue one is more expensive but never shows up as blue.

I was sent the wrong laptop. I was sent a laptop that was worth less than the one I purchased, and i'm having to wait for a refund and they are saying they can't refund my protection plan i will have to use it on a new computer or receive the $59 on a gift card. Never ordering something this expensive online again. Waiting on them to credit my card and for them to be in stock so i can just go pick it up at the store. ... very unhappy!!!

reviews.title: Beware of this seller! Total unprofessional
reviews.review_text: Beware! Do not do business with this seller. They sent out the wrong color laptop, then refused to send out a return label so that we can send their item back to them so they could return our money. I blame Walmart for allowing such an unprofessional seller on their platform. Company should not be allowed to sell on any platform.

reviews.title: Warning: Don’t buy
reviews.review_text: I had the computer for a week. Worked great and then went to turn it on one morning. The screen started flashing and it went black. The computer bricked. I can’t turn it on. I’ve done everything to try and fix it - I work in IT. Don’t buy it. It feels super cheap too. You get what you pay for.

reviews.title: HP Laptop
reviews.review_text: This HP lap top did not work properly. I could not get it to setup. After repeating the setup steps over and over and over. Determine that the lap top was a peace of trash. I would not recommend this item for purchase!

reviews.title: Defective
reviews.review_text: The laptop worked fine for 1-2 minutes, then froze up for about 1/2 hour. It did this repeatedly. I returned it to the local store the next day. Now I have to wait for 2 weeks for a refund. Hopefully I will get my money back.

reviews.title: Unwanted Involuntary Actions
reviews.review_text: I have only had this laptop for a few months, and it has consistently experienced serious performance issues. While working, the device frequently performs involuntary actions on its own, disrupting productivity. The only way to temporarily resolve the problem is by completely shutting the laptop down, which is neither practical nor acceptable for a new device. Unfortunately, the only solution offered so far has been to continue shutting it down when issues occur, which does not address the underlying problem.

reviews.title: Would not recommend
reviews.review_text: In your advertisement, you do not say that there is no facial recognition or fingerprint ability. As far as the keyboard, it is the same color as the background, so it is difficult to see the letters. My suggestion would be to light up the keyboard or put better letters on the keys.

Ordered the item, the shipping was a hot mess. When it finally said it was delivered, it was delivered to Delaware I live in Texas. I contacted Walmart and the customer representative was very helpful and reached out to the seller for them to contact me. They emailed stating the package was delivered on this date. I replied it was not delivered and I would like a refund. Waited a few more days, no response. I contacted Walmart again, again they reached out to the seller to contact me. The second email from buyer basically said it was delivered check with neighbors or family members to check receipt. I replied back that I have cameras, my neighbors have cameras and nothing was delivered. I also advised them that delivery services take pictures of the package when it's delivered. I got the email it was delivered but no picture. Walmart was very helpful in every aspect of this. I only gave a low rating so they would take notice of their 3rd party seller on marketplace. I finally did get a refund from Walmart.

reviews.title: HP doesn't stand behind the products. Very Sad
reviews.review_text: This Hp laptop worked ok for a couple of weeks and then BLUE SCREEN OF DEATH tryed all of the things that HP suggested online but no one would ansewer customer service calls so I contacted the seller and they only warrantee for 15 days. So I am out the money and the laptop is unusable. I will purchase a Dell.
Hardware crash within 6 months and the warranty company is stating accidental damage which is not true so I’m out $400 which is crazy. Highly dissatisfied!

reviews.title: Ineffective Product
reviews.review_text: The performance is inadequate, frequently experiencing lag and freezing. This product is unsuitable for professional and educational use, rendering it ineffective.
Display was blurry and faint. I contacted HP for support, HP told me the laptop had been altered so therefore the warranty was void so I had no choice but to return it.

reviews.title: Stopped working, would not turn on
reviews.review_text: The laptop was great when I first started using it after like 3-4 days it just stopped working and would not turn on, I had some people try to help me figure it out but no one could get it working, had to return product, now I’m worried because I had already transferred everything over and really needed it for school

I was getting it for a friend and had to go in with my Microsoft account then it charged me for a year of their product. It got my credit card number and I had a hard time getting that out then finally returned the laptop. The lady it was a gift for didn't have a Microsoft account.

reviews.title: hp
reviews.review_text: like the comp, Hate the fact you get directed to call center saying your drives need to be updated on brand new laptop tried the same thing with hp printer once i convinced them they arent gettting any money miracuously both items work just fine huge scam shame o hp

reviews.title: will never know if this product os ror real!
reviews.review_text: had three promissong delivery date,(seller was saying my address was wrong, when i had the correct addres on this order since the begining!) eventually I jad to contact the carrier and "correct" the address that was already correct! Walmart support with the same position asking 48hrs to resolve the problem, after the third time with the same reaponse from Walmartz ive cancelled the order. than the cherry of the cake was walmart representative offering a US 10,00 voucher for all inconvenience! this attitude made me think twice before buy from walmart online again, you can't buy off people loke that!

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.review_text: My last laptop was an HP, so I figured this would be the same. This one is slow, and all I do on it is homework and search for info; so the most I'll have open at one time is 3 tabs. I guess it's ok for what I need it for, but I expected it to run smoothly.

reviews.title: Brand-New %26 Defective!! Don't Waste Your Time!
reviews.review_text: Wow, useless and super disappointing!!! Pros: Pretty Lightweight Price Cons: Defective Keys don't work properly (Caps Lock) Mousepad isn't responsive Pages don't populate correctly: won't open/cuts off close tabs, save buttons, etc. Hair-pulling to use!!! For a brand new laptop, and HP at that, I expected a product I could rely on for my business. Waited a week for delivery, and after 24hrs of having it, I have submitted a return. No, I do not recommend this product.

reviews.title: You won’t receive the item shown in the photo
reviews.review_text: The item shown is not what you will receive. I wanted a pink laptop as shown and described in the listing. I received a rose gold outside and silver inside laptop. I paid a lot more to buy this one bc I wanted a pink one. I could have paid $164 for a silver Chromebook’s at Walmart. So I guess I’ll save money and buy the other one. Already printed out the label to return this one. I guess they don’t think ppl will care that they don’t get was is advertised but I do! Don’t show a pink laptop if you’re selling a silver one ! This is not pink on the outside as shown either it’s rose gold. Too pricey to settle for something you didn’t even want ! See pics

reviews.title: WRONG COMPUTER SENT TO ME and STILL NO REFUND
reviews.review_text: they sent the wrong computer; I ordered one with the media card reader and they sent one without. STILL WAITING FOR REFUND!
was lead to think it was touch screen and it is not. i don't feel like going through the hassel of returning it so I'll just keep it.
I did not receive the correct computer. It came with an sd card, but there is nowhere to put it. I am trying to contact the seller.

reviews.title: Lies and paid to set it up with help and no help
reviews.review_text: For one I paid for help to set it up remotely and I never received it and I want my money back for it. Secondly, when I looked it up, it said it was a touchscreen and it is nowhere possible touchscreen.

reviews.title: Light colored keys.
reviews.review_text: The only negative I have found is you better know your keys because you sure can't find them by looking. The letters are soooo lightly colored you have to tilt it just the right way to see them.
Made in 2020. It is NOT the newest model. I had to return mine because it didn't work and still waiting for refund.

reviews.title: Don’t buy from this seller
reviews.review_text: I bought 2 laptops from this seller. They failed to send one of the memory cards. The seller said they would send. Never received. I could have just bought the cheaper laptop and bought my own memory card. Which I ended up having to do anyway.

reviews.title: Short battery life
reviews.review_text: It’s not what I expected. If you’re looking for a comp that has a long battery life, this one isn’t it. Within 2 days of purchase, comp was saying “high cpu”.
Not bat, the only complaint I have is that it moves a little slow with a little lag and it did not come with the right amount of storage or the Storage disk.

reviews.title: Mixed Feeling About the G9
reviews.review_text: Having previously owned an EliteDesk G4 Tower I was expecting the Elite G9 to be a natural progression. However, I have mixed views. While the larger amount of RAM, the better processor, and faster USB ports were an immediate benefit, I was disappointed that HP has removed the rear line-input and didn't fit an optical drive. I was aware of the missing input, and I've had to utilise the front socket. However, I was misled about the optical drive. I had asked the sales support if an optical drive was fitted, and I understood it was. It isn't. It may well be possible to fit one later, but that's not the point. Also, I've mixed feelings about HP Wolf Security. Having read a lot of reviews I'm in two minds whether to replace with my trusted alternative. However, having said all that, I'm looking forward to years of reliable service. If the G9 does as well as the G4 I'll be well pleased.

reviews.title: Slow and Drags
reviews.review_text: It seems to drag and slow im holding out on my ratings for now, not convinced im gonna keep it
Very slow when doing my virtual sessions. I would not recommend for anyone who is purchasing this laptop for work.

reviews.title: Turtle slow
reviews.review_text: It's very slow and overrides any app you use. I don't like this at all

reviews.title: HP ZBook Firefly slower than expected
reviews.review_text: While I haven't explored the full capacity of my new ZBook, I'm a bit surprised how slow it is compared to my previous HP Envy which was 5 years old. It seems to take a while to process opening and running software and applications, and the fan starts going full speed even with programs I didn't think were that heavy to run. Still early days but not blown away as I expected to be
This laptop did not work. Therefore it has to be returned. I would not recommend this computer.
The computer is awesome but it says it comes with 12 months of windows free and it does not .
